title:
New Hanover County is building new boat ramps at the end of my street - Trails End Rd - so this has turned into a PUBLIC

PARK location now- and they have placed several trash cans there , but after this construction is completed - are they going to install picnic tables - sheltered areas and public restrooms like other County parks????
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100127/ARTICLES/100129685?p=1&tc=pg
